Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Pokemon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fire, Grass, PokemonDecorator, Water

    public abstract class Pokemon
extends Entity
    Represents a Pokemon Entity.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double[][] battleTable
      Battle Table represents type advantages for Fire [0], Water [1], and Grass [2].

    • Field Detail

      • battleTable

        public static final double[][] battleTable
        Battle Table represents type advantages for Fire [0], Water [1], and Grass [2]. battleTable[Attacking Type][Defending Type]

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon(java.lang.String n,
               int h,
               int m)
        Constructor creates a new Pokemon.
        Parameters:
        n - String representing the Pokemon's name.
        h - Current Health
        m - Max Health

    • Method Detail

      • getAttackTypeMenu

        public java.lang.String getAttackTypeMenu()

        Returns:

      • getNumAttackTypeMenuItems

        public int getNumAttackTypeMenuItems()
        Returns the number of items in the attack type menu.
        Returns:
        Integer for total menu items.

      • getAttackMenu

        public java.lang.String getAttackMenu(int atkType)
        Returns a string representing the attack menu.
        Parameters:
        atkType - Attack Type represented as int.
        Returns:
        Menu for Attack Type, otherwise "INVALID MENU".

      • getNumAttackMenuItems

        public int getNumAttackMenuItems(int atkType)
        Returns the number of items in the menu.
        Parameters:
        atkType - Attack Type represented as int.
        Returns:
        Number representing the attack menu items, invalid atkType returns -1.

      • attack

        public java.lang.String attack(Pokemon p,
                               int atkType,
                               int move)
        Accomplishes an attack.
        Parameters:
        p - Pokemon to attack.
        atkType - Attack Type
        move - Integer representing the attack.
        Returns:
        Message describing the event.

      • getAttackString

        public java.lang.String getAttackString(int atkType,
                                        int move)
        Returns the partial string for the attack.
        Parameters:
        atkType - Attack Type represented as int.
        move - Move represented as int.
        Returns:
        Verb of the attack, partial string for the full attack string, [Error] if invalid atkType.

      • getAttackDamage

        public int getAttackDamage(int atkType,
                           int move)
        Returns the attack damage without Multiplier.
        Parameters:
        atkType - Attack Type represented as int.
        move - Move represented as int.
        Returns:
        Damage value to be used, 0 if invalid atkType / move.

      • getAttackMultiplier

        public double getAttackMultiplier(Pokemon p,
                                  int atkType)
        Returns the attack multiplier based on the battle table. Attack Multiplier Damage = Damage * Multiplier
        Parameters:
        p - Pokemon
        atkType - Attack Type represented by int.
        Returns:
        Multiplier depending on types, 1.0 if atkType is 1 (Basic).

      • getAttackBonus

        public int getAttackBonus(int atkType)
        Returns the attack bonus based on Decorator Attack Bonus Damage = Damage + Bonus
        Parameters:
        atkType - Attack Type represented by int.
        Returns:
        Attack Bonus

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the type based on the Class used for the Pokemon. 0 represents Fire. 1 represents Water. 2 represents Grass.
        Returns:
        Integer representing Pokemon Type. -1 if no type found.
